ModulePrefs.title: Uservoice for Google Sites
ModulePrefs.description: Add support and feedback features provided by Uservoice service to your Google Site
ModulePrefs.author: Serge Populov

Module.Content: REPLACE THIS TEXT WITH YOUR SCRIPT GENERATED BY https://YOURNAME.uservoice.com/admin/settings#/channels/classic-widget-inline SEE DEMO SAMPLE AT https://google-sites-uservoice.googlecode.com/git/uservoice-gadget-custom-demo.xml
